text: The Sky Beckons () is a 1959 Soviet science-fiction movie directed by Mikhail Karyukov and Aleksandr Kozyr.Кино повторного действияНебо зовет It stars Ivan Pereverzev, Alexander Shvoryn, and Constantine Bartashevich. == Actors == * Ivan Pereverzev — scientist Eugene Kornev * Alexander Shvoryn — engineer Andrey Gordienko * Constantine Bartashevich — astronaut Robert Clark * Gurgen Tonunts — astronaut Erwin Verst * Valentin Chernyak — cosmonaut Gregory Somov * Viktor Dobrovolsky — space station chief Vasily Demchenko == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian science fiction movies Category:1959 science fiction movies Category:Movies about astronauts
title: The Sky Beckons
